verses.text: These also \add are\add* the \w generations|strong="H8435"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add that\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* with \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.

And these \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*; \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w*, \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* which were \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w*, whom he \w consecrated|strong="H4390"\w* to minister in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*.\f + \fr 3.3 \ft whom…: Heb. whose hand he filled\f*

And \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, when they \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, and they had no \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* and \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w* ministered in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Bring|strong="H7126"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, and \w present|strong="H5975"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, that they may \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto him.

And they shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*, and the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, to \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

And they shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

And thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: they \add are\add* wholly \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto him out of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And thou shalt \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and they shall wait \w on|strong="H8104"\w* their \w priest’s office|strong="H3550"\w*: and the \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* that cometh \w nigh|strong="H7131"\w* shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

And I, behold, I have \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* instead of all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* that \w openeth|strong="H6363"\w* the \w matrix|strong="H7358"\w* among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: therefore the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall be mine;

Because all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \add are\add* mine; \add for\add* on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* I \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w* unto me all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, both \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*: mine shall they be: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Number|strong="H6485"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* after the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: every \w male|strong="H2145"\w* from a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* shalt thou \w number|strong="H6485"\w* them.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* them according to the \w word|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as he was \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.\f + \fr 3.16 \ft word: Heb. mouth\f*

And these were the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* by their \w names|strong="H8034"\w*; \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, and \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, and \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*.

And these \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*; \w Libni|strong="H3845"\w*, and \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*; \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*, and \w Izehar|strong="H3324"\w*, \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*; \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w*, and \w Mushi|strong="H4187"\w*. These \add  \+w are|strong="H1992"\+w*\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* according to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w* \add was\add* the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Libnites|strong="H3846"\w*, and the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shimites|strong="H8097"\w*: these \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Gershonites|strong="H1649"\w*.

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of all the \w males|strong="H2145"\w*, from a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, \add even\add* those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them \add were\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

The \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Gershonites|strong="H1649"\w* shall \w pitch|strong="H2583"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*.

And the \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w Gershonites|strong="H1649"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Eliasaph|strong="H0460"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Lael|strong="H3815"\w*.

And the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, the \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* thereof, and the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* for the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*,

And the \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, and the \w curtain|strong="H4539"\w* for the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, which \add is\add* by the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and by the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and the \w cords|strong="H4340"\w* of it for all the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* thereof.

¶ And of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* \add was\add* the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Amramites|strong="H6020"\w*, and the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Izeharites|strong="H3325"\w*, and the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Hebronites|strong="H2276"\w*, and the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Uzzielites|strong="H5817"\w*: these \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*.

In the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of all the \w males|strong="H2145"\w*, from a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, \add were\add* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.

The \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* shall \w pitch|strong="H2583"\w* on the \w side|strong="H3409"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w southward|strong="H8486"\w*.

And the \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w* \add shall be\add* \w Elizaphan|strong="H0469"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*.

And their \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, and the \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, and the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*, and the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* wherewith they \w minister|strong="H8334"\w*, and the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w*, and all the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* thereof.

And \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \add shall be\add* \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* over the \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add and have\add* the \w oversight|strong="H6486"\w* of them that \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.

¶ Of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* \add was\add* the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Mahlites|strong="H4250"\w*, and the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Mushites|strong="H4188"\w*: these \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*.

And those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of all the \w males|strong="H2145"\w*, from a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, \add were\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

And the \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* \add was\add* \w Zuriel|strong="H6700"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abihail|strong="H0032"\w*: \add these\add* shall \w pitch|strong="H2583"\w* on the \w side|strong="H3409"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*.

And \add under\add* the \w custody|strong="H6486"\w* and \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* thereof, and the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* thereof, and the \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* thereof, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, and all that \w serveth|strong="H5656"\w* thereto,\f + \fr 3.36 \ft under…: Heb. the office of the charge\f*

And the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*, and their \w pins|strong="H3489"\w*, and their \w cords|strong="H4340"\w*.

¶ But those that \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6924"\w*, \add even\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*, \add shall be\add* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* for the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and the \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* that cometh \w nigh|strong="H7131"\w* shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

All that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* at the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, throughout their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, all the \w males|strong="H2145"\w* from a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Number|strong="H6485"\w* all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of the \w males|strong="H2145"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, and \w take|strong="H5375"\w* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of their \w names|strong="H8034"\w*.

And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* for me (I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*) instead of all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* instead of all the \w firstlings|strong="H1060"\w* among the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him, all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w* by the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, of those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, were \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and threescore and \w thirteen|strong="H7657"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* instead of all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* instead of their \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*; and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall be mine: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And for those that are to be \w redeemed|strong="H6302"\w* of the two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and threescore and \w thirteen|strong="H7657"\w* of the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which are \w more|strong="H5736"\w* \w than|strong="H5921"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*;

Thou shalt even \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* apiece by the \w poll|strong="H1538"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* shalt thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add them:\add* (the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* \add is\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w gerahs|strong="H1626"\w*:)

And thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, wherewith the odd \w number|strong="H5736"\w* of them is to be \w redeemed|strong="H6302"\w*, unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w redemption|strong="H6306"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of them that were \w over|strong="H5736"\w* and above them that were \w redeemed|strong="H6302"\w* by the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*:

Of the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* he the \w money|strong="H3701"\w*; a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \add shekels\add*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*:

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of them that were \w redeemed|strong="H6302"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, according to the \w word|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
